page.title: 15Home Life.
page.content: Shopping can be a problem in a rural area such as ours.Within our block there are two Post Offices which sell a few groceries and also a small general store but no supermarket. The nearest small market town is 2 miles away ,eventhough there are a few food shops,butchers and a bakery there,the nearest draper is 6 miles away. To add to this a large number of people are not on a bus route.This can be a problem for the elderly and for mothers with young children. During the last few years an incresing number of people are taking advantage of late night shopping in the local towns.Mail Order is becoming more popular for household and general goods. Some tradesmen sell goods door to door in the area.
